item.title: Online Ramsey number survey
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: Together with my advisor Tomáš ↗ we upkeep a website with results in the online Ramsey number theory which is localed at https://turing.cz/tom/online-ramsey/ ↗. Known results 2014 - Ordered Ramsey Theory and Track Representations of Graphs, PDF ↗ - Milans, Stolee, West todo 2014 - Ordered Ramsey numbers, PDF ↗, arxiv ↗ - Conlon, Fox, Lee, Sudakov todo 2018 - Ordered Size Ramsey Number of Paths, PDF ↗, arxiv ↗ - Balko, Cibulka, Král, Kynčl todo todo todo
